Gentoo Linux

Pros

  • Rolling release1).
  • Independent distribution.
  • Native non SystemD init system (OpenRC).
  • Amount of packages in repositories + pentesting tools2).
  • CLI installation.
  • The widest processor architecture support.
  • Stable.
  • Multiple C libraries support (glibc, musl).

Cons

  • Source based.
  • Time consuming.

Unsure

  • Package manager (emerge)?
  • Kernel versions and management?
  • Respecting FSF?
1)
Versions of various linux distributions: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Comparison_of_Linux_distributions#General
2)
Pentoo: https://pentoo.org.
